snippet: House Speaker John A. Boehner is leading a delegation to Brazil, Colombia and Mexico as the House prepares to take up energy and infrastructure legislation that is part of the Republican jobs agenda.
abstract: House Speaker John A. Boehner is leading a delegation to Brazil, Colombia and Mexico as the House prepares to take up energy and infrastructure legislation that is part of the Republican jobs agenda.

headline.main: House Delegation Visits Latin American Countries
